Description.Text: Kharkiv Palace Premier is a luxury 5-star hotel offering elegant accommodation in the heart of Kharkiv. Highlights include an indoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and an excellent location steps from Freedom Square. Kharkiv is the second largest city in Ukraine and boasts diverse architecture, beautiful parks and large squares. Nearby places of interest include Freedom Square, the 17th-century Pokrovsky Cathedral, The Assumption Cathedral, Karkov Botanical Garden and Sumska Streets. Hosprom metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Kharkiv destinations. The hotel is housed in a contemporary mid-rise building with a glass facade. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, a fitness centre, a beauty salon and a gift shop. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Classic rooms are 26sqm, modern and comfortably furnished featuring plush furniture and city views. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV, a mini-bar, tea and coffee equipment, a telephone and a work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a shower, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Pacific Spoon Restaurant offers Pacific Rim dishes in a relaxed and ambient setting open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Amadeus Restaurant offers European cuisine in a traditional Venetian-themed environment featuring elegant interiors and a summer terrace. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the social lobby bar or the chic Sky Lounge Bar with panoramic views of the city. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
